comments: Sac County Air Unit assisted ground units with checking the area of the 700 block of Grand Ave for a report of a disturbance.
helicopter responded to the area of 3530 Truxel RD for reports of a stolen car in the area
Helicopter responded to the area of Folsom Blvd and Margaret Ln for an officer fighting with someone.  That person was detained.
Helicopter responded to the area of 6710 Folsom Blvd for reports of a person brandishing a knife.  Subject was unable to be located by officers
Helicopter responded to the area of Dnieper River Way and Bombili St to search the area for a missing person.   Missing person was located
Helicopter responded to the area of Power Inn Rd and 38th Ave for reports of an assault using a car.
Helicopter responded to the area of La Riviera Dr and Lido Cir for reports of a subject with a knife.  Units were unable to locate the subject.
Helicopter responding to the area of 25th st and x st for reports of subjects with guns.
helicopter responding to the area of cosumnes river blvd and franklin blvd for reports of a side show
AIR1 responded with units for a subject armed with a gun, turned out to be unfounded.
AIR1 assisted with general crime fighting efforts in the greater Sacramento area.
Colfax St/Arden Way - Responded out to assist ground units search for subjects involved in a disturbance in the area.
Lanatt St/Elvas Ave - Responded out to assist ground units search for armed subject. Subject was located.
AIR1 assisting in locating a burglary suspect
AIR1 assisting in locating a missing juvenile
AIR1 assisting in locating a robbery suspect
La Riviera Dr/Lido Cir - Responded out to assist ground units search for suspect involved in a possible burglary.
Helicopter assisted officers searching the area for subject (s) shooting at passing vehicles with a paintball gun.  Helicopter and officers were unable to locate anyone in the area.
Helicopter assisted officers searching area for a missing suicidal male.  Officer have located.

Helicopter in the area assisting officers searching area for suspects who took off running from a stolen vehicle.  subjects jumped a fence onto school property then took off on foot westbound from school property near South Ave/Fig St...#1 male African American, juvenile, black hooded sweatshirt, stonewash jeans, bright blue underwear...#2 male African  American, juvenile, black hooded sweatshirt, black jeans, black and white shoes.  Officers still on scene searching the area

Los Gatos Cir/Havenside Dr - Responded out to assist ground units search for a missing person. The missing person is a 14-year-old African American female with pink braids on the left side of her hair. She was last seen wearing a black zip-up hooded jackets, pink tank top, black Nike shorts with the Nike logo, and carrying a large blue and pink backpack.
